items.title: 天 (tiān)
items.content:
Meaning: sky, heaven, day

Pinyin: tiān

Stroke count: 4

This character represents the sky or heaven. It shows a person (大) with a line above representing the sky.

items.title: 水 (shuǐ)
items.content:
Meaning: water, liquid

Pinyin: shuǐ

Stroke count: 4

This character means water. Its form suggests flowing water with a central stream and drops on the sides.
